title: HTML/CSS Quiz
description: Test your web development skills with HTML and CSS questions

questions.question: Which HTML tag is used to create a hyperlink?
questions.explanation: The <a> (anchor) tag is used to create hyperlinks in HTML.

questions.question: What does CSS stand for?
questions.explanation: CSS stands for Cascading Style Sheets.

questions.question: Which CSS property is used to change the text color?
questions.explanation: The 'color' property is used to set the text color in CSS.

questions.question: What is the correct HTML tag for the largest heading?
questions.explanation: <h1> is the largest heading tag in HTML, with <h6> being the smallest.

questions.question: Which CSS property is used to make text bold?
questions.explanation: The font-weight property is used to make text bold (font-weight: bold).

questions.question: What is the correct way to include CSS in an HTML document?
questions.explanation: The <link> tag with rel='stylesheet' is used to include external CSS files.

questions.question: Which HTML attribute specifies an alternate text for an image?
questions.explanation: The 'alt' attribute provides alternative text for images when they cannot be displayed.

questions.question: What does the CSS box model consist of?
questions.explanation: The CSS box model consists of content, padding, border, and margin (from inside to outside).

questions.question: Which HTML tag is used to create a table?
questions.explanation: The <table> tag is used to create tables in HTML.

questions.question: What does the CSS property 'display: none' do?
questions.explanation: display: none completely removes the element from the document flow.

questions.question: Which attribute specifies the URL of a linked resource?
questions.explanation: The href attribute specifies the URL of the page the link goes to.

questions.question: What is the purpose of the <head> section in HTML?
questions.explanation: The <head> section contains metadata about the HTML document.

questions.question: Which CSS property controls the space between lines of text?
questions.explanation: line-height property controls the space between lines of text.

questions.question: What does the HTML5 <article> tag represent?
questions.explanation: The <article> tag represents independent, self-contained content.

questions.question: Which CSS property is used to create rounded corners?
questions.explanation: border-radius property creates rounded corners on elements.

questions.question: What is the difference between <div> and <span>?
options: div is block-level, span is inline
div is inline, span is block-level
questions.explanation: <div> is a block-level element, <span> is an inline element.

questions.question: Which HTML attribute makes an input field required?
questions.explanation: The required attribute makes an input field mandatory to fill out.

questions.question: What does CSS 'position: fixed' do?
questions.explanation: position: fixed positions element relative to viewport and keeps it in place during scrolling.

questions.question: Which HTML tag is used for the largest heading?
questions.explanation: <h1> creates the largest heading, with <h6> being the smallest.
